import React, { useStatus, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import products from "../products"; const ProductScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => String(p._id) === id); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out Of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
